Description:
IN/01G02/KC/151021/1 - 311971036 - You have failed to ensure so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety and welfare at work of your clinical and estates employees and other persons who may be affected by manual handling operations arising out of your undertaking, namely providing patient care, in that steps have not been taken to reduce the risk of injury to the lowest level reasonably practicable, by providing the necessary information, instruction and training to those undertaking manual handling operations when working in the Balfour Hospital.

IN/01G02/KC/151021/2 - 311971634 - You have failed to ensure so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety and welfare at work of your employees and other persons who may be affected by your undertaking eg providing care for patients, in that arrangements for the effective planning of the preventative and protective measures required to reduce the risk to those undertaking manual handling operations have not been made.
